inn1.comm: outside the off stump, moving away a touch, takes Jaysuriya by surprise
outside the off stump, Jaysuriya gets onto the backfoot and guides it to backward point
outside the off stump, and Jayasuriya has a good look at it before letting it got to the keeper
outside the off stump and left alone again by Jayasuriya
on the three quarters length again and left all alone by Jayasuriya
thats not what you should be doing, Mashrafe pitches it short and Jayasuriya capitalises as he flays it over point for a boundary
works it square of the wicket on the onside.
that is feeding Sangakkara, down the leg side and he neatly glances it fine to the fence.
works in front of square leg, a slight misfield allows the single.
short down the leg side, signaled a wide.
bad delivery on the legs and Jayasuriya flicks it to long leg for a single.
good length delivery angled across, left alone.
not much bounce as the ball is angled across, left alone through to Mushfiqur Rahim.
swings down the leg side, signaled a wide.
back of a length delivery and Jayasuriya pushes in the gap through cover to the deep.
off the pad the ball goes square of the wicket on the onside.
good tight delivery on the off stump, gets behind it and defends to the off side.
worked to the onside.
pitched up delivery driven to the left of mid-on for a single.
worked to the fielder at short midwicket.
pushes to cover.
short of a length delivery defended with an angled bat to point.
moves forward and mistimes the drive to cover.
bad line from Shahadat Hossain, on the pads and neatly turned behind square leg to the deep.
short ball and Jayasuriya mistimes the pull to deep-backward square leg.
terrible delivery from Shahadat, full down the leg side and Sangakkara tickles it down to fine leg fence.
outside the off stump, Jayasuriya pushes it on the off side for a single
on the legs and Sangakkara is too good to let go of these as he pushes it firmly through square leg for a boundary
slower outside the off stump, Sangakkara is alert to the task as he pushes it to point
slower delivery outside the of stump, Sangakkara is unable to pierce the gaps on the off side as he pushes it to the point fielder
fuller outside the off stump, Sangakkara punches it to mid off
on the off stump, Sangakkara gets behind the line of the delivery and pushes it past midwicket for a couple
outside the off stump, defended on the backfoot by Jayasuriya
short on the leg stump, Jayasuriya swivels and looks to pull it but gets a glove on it as the ball trickles to fine leg boundary
short outside the off stump, Jayasuriya takes the frontfoot out of the way and cuts it. The ball goes to the point fence for a boundary
short on the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
obviously Shahadat is not learning his lessons well as he pitches it short once again and Jayasuriya uncorks the cut shot and sends it screaming to the cover fence
bouces him on the middle stump this time around
wide down the leg stump
short outside the off stump, Sangakkara gets his body behind the line and defends it to point
short outside the off stump, Sangakkara looks to go through the covers, but the extra pace unsettles him as he plays the shot a touch too early
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
on a good length outside the off stump, Sangakkara is unable to pick the gaps on the off side field
bowls onto the pads, Sangakkara waits for it and rolls his wrists on the ball as the ball goes behind square leg where Dollar dives for a valiant cause
on the middle stump, defends on the frontfoot
and opens up with a wide down the leg side. A poor loosener this
on the middle stump, Jayasuriya comes forward and gets an inside edge back onto his pads, thus nullifying the appeal made by Dollar
right on the three quarters length on the middle stump, Jayasuriya defends on the frontfoot
on a good length on the middle stump, Jayasuriya comes down the track and thumps it over long on for a huge six that neutralizes the advantage gained whatsoever in the over
on the off stump, Jayasuriya comes onto the frontfoot and presents a dead face
Jayasuriya on the run, literally. He comes down the track and finds the ball rushing onto him on the leg stump. Nonetheless he pulls it over midwicket for a boundary. Good adjustment here
outside the off stump, Jayasuriya looks to drive it on the off side but gets an inside edge to short fine leg
on the leg stump, Sangakkara pats the ball to fine leg to hand the strike back to Jayasuriya
good length delivery pushed on the leg side

full length delivery. Jayasuriya has a full tilt at it but ends up getting an outside edge to third man for a couple. Jayasuriya is lucky that he did not get more wood onto it or else he would have been back to the pavilion
outside the off stump, squares up Jayasuriya, who manges to get a feeble edge, which does not carry  to the keeper.
on the middle stump, Sangakkara is testing his defensive skills here
with the fine leg up in the circle, Dollar goes down the leg stump again, begging to be hit. Jayasuriya, just turns it round the corner for a boundary
Ladies and Gentlemen, thats as good a backhand lob as you will get. Well, Jayasuriya comes down the track and lobs it over the bowler's head. It could have given the jeepers to Henin- the lob
wide down the leg side
fuller on the leg stump, Jayasuriya lofts it to deep midwicket for a couple
Jayasuriya is making a mockery of the field placements as he comes down the track and lofts it to long on for a boundary.
short outside the off stump, Jayasuriya gets onto the backfoot and cuts it to cover for a single to get to his 65th ODI fifty
outside the off stump, Sangakkara guides it to third man to retain the strike
short outside the off stump, Sangakkara just opens the face of the bat and pushes it to point
outside the off stump, Sangakkara looks to ease the ball to third man but does not beat the fielder at point
fuller outside the off stump, Sangakkara pushes it to mid off
slower delivery outside the off stump, Sangakkara lobs it to mid off for a single. It was quite risky as Sangakkara had to hurry in the end to beat the throw
outside the off stump, Jayasuriya pushes it to point
on a good length outside the off stump, Jayasuriya defends it back onto the pitch
pitches it on the leg stump, Sangakkara sweeps but does not clear the fielder at short fine leg
on the middle stump, Sangakkara punches it to midwicket for a single
outside the leg stump, Jayasuriya looks to sweep, but is rapped on the pads to get a leg bye
wide down the leg stump, and they cross twice to get three runs for the delivery
wide down the leg stump again
outside the stump, Jaaysuriya is rapped on the pads again
short on the leg stump, Jayasuriya whips it to midwicket
outside the off stump, Sangakkara comes down the track and defends
short outside the off stump, Sangakkara guides it to point for a single
on the off stump, Jayasuriya pushes it to cover
short outside the off stump, Jayasuriya cuts it past point for a single
outside the off stump, Sangakkara looks to cut and misses out
on the off stump, Sangakkara defends it to midwicket
fuller on the middle stump, Jayasuriya defends on the frontfoot
fulltoss outside the off stump, Jayasuriya pushes it to cover
short outside the off stump, Jayasuriya is making room as the ball is being bowled and cuts it over covers for a boundary
wide down the leg stump
on the leg stump, Jayasuriya turns it to fine leg for a single
on the leg stump, Sangakkara taps it to fine leg for another single
short on the middle stump and Jayasuriya feasts on it as he sends the ball high over deep midwicket fence for a huge six to bring the hundred partnership up
on the leg stump, Sangakkara sweeps it to long leg for a couple
on the leg stump, Sangakkara pushes it behind square for a single
Jayasuriya comes down the track and lofts it over mid off for a boundary
is Jayasuriya in some hurry to catch a flight or what as he comes down the track and lofts it high and handsome over the straight fence to bring up his third six for the match
Razzak douses the fire going around as he castles Jayasuriya with an arm ball. Jayasuriya was beaten by the pace as Razzak had absolutely fired it in
short outside the off stump, Mahela cuts it to point where a good fielding effort saves a certain boundary
drifts down the leg stump with the very first ball as Sangakkara pulls it away to fine leg to fetch four easy runs for himself. Poor bowling this by Shahadat
now thats a better way to bowl as he pitches it on the middle stump and Sangakkara closes the bat at the last moment and defends it to midwicket
goes drifting down the leg stump again as it is called a wide
fuller length delivery on the middle stump, Sangakkara defends on the frontfoot
fuller outside the off stump, Sangakkara drives it to cover, but straight to the fielder
short outside the off stump, Sangakkara cuts it to point. A misfield allows him to take a single
short outside the off stump, Jayawardene has now played two cut shots without getting to the boundary
just short in length, Sangakkara allows the ball to come to him as he squeezes it past covers for a boundary
on the leg stump, Sangakkara sweeps it to fine leg
on the leg stump again as he turns it to fine leg once again
outside the off stump, Sangakkara comes onto the frontfoot and defends it
Sangakkara gets onto the frontfoot and pushes it to the vacant spaces on the leg side for a single
short on the off stump, Sangakkara drives it to long off for a couple
Sangakkara attempts a wild slog now as he does not clear the mid on
why slog when you can cream the way you can? Sangakkara spots the short delivery and pulls it to midwicket for a boundary. .What a majestic sight that
now a copy book straight drive to follow the brutal pull and Sangakkara gets his half century with this shot
phew! To show that the pull shot earlier in the over was no flash in pan, Sangakkara uncorks a similar shot and is tearing apart Shahadat, who does not know where to bowl now
outside the off stump, Sangakkara defends on the frontfoot
ah! what a sight! Mahela waits for the ball and delicately cuts it away past the short third man for a boundary
outside the off stump, Mahela comes down the track and pushes it to cover for a single
outside the off stump, Sangakkara comes down the track and defends
outside the off stump, Sangakkara sweeps it across the line to deep midwicket for a couple
on the leg stump, Sangakkara pushes it to fine leg for a single
as Shahadat he too drifts down the leg stump and pays the price as it is called a wide
half volley on the off stump, Sangakkara drives it to long off for another boundary
Sangakkara is literally toying with the attack now as he lofts it away to long leg for another boundary
Sangakkara is rubbing it in as he comes down the track and lofts it over the bowler's head for his third boundary in a row. So much for slightly erring in length
dropped! full toss outside the off stump, Sangakkara drives it back to the bowler, who is unable to hold onto it on his follow through
on the leg stump, Sangakkara pushes it to deep midwicket for a boundary, the fourth of the over
on the leg stump, Sangakkara pushes it past short fine leg for the fifth boundary of the over. What an over this for Sri Lanka
fuller outside the off stump, Mahela pushes it back to the bowler
bowls a yorker outside the off stump, Mahela defends it back to the bowler
pushes on the leg side for a single
on the leg stump, Sangakkara pushes it to long on to exchange strike
fuller on the leg stump, Mahela pushes it back to the bowler again

and Bangladesh have their second wicket as Mahela looks to cut it and gets an inside edge onto the top of the off stump. Mahela can only look back in despair now as he has blown away an oppurtunity to score big
on the leg stump, Sangakkara, as is his wont flicks it away to fine leg
on the off stump, looks to play it away on the leg side but gets a leading edge to short third man
short outside the off stump, Kapuigedera cuts it past covers for a boundary
on the off stump, Kapugerdera comes forward and defends
short outside the off stump, Kapugedera cuts it to point
on the leg stump, Kapugedera pushes it to mid off
half volley outside the off stump, Sangakkara drives it to deep cover for a couple
outside the off stump, Sangakkara guides it to short third man
on the leg stump, Sangakkara closes the face of the bat as he gets himself a single
off the pads for a leg bye
on the leg stump, Sangakkara comes forward and defends
on the leg stump, Sangakkara looks to sweep but gets a bottom edge
full outside the off stump, Kapugedera pushes it to mid off for a single
on the leg stump, Sangakkara punches it to long on for a single
well flighted delivery on the middle stump, Kapugedera comes down the track and lofts it away to long on for a six
on the off stump, Kapugedera drives it to long on for a single
fuller on the middle stump, Sangakkara lofts it to long on for a single
outside the off stump, Kapugedera looks to cut it fine but does not get the ball past short third man
on the leg stump, Sangakkara pushes it to midwicket for a single
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
short outside the off stump, drives it to sweeper on the off side for a single
on the leg stump, Sangakkara turns it to midwicket for a single
wide down the leg side
outside the off stump, Kapugedera defends on the frontfoot
on the leg stump, struck on the pads
on the off stump, Sangakkara defends on the frontfoot
full length delivery on the off stump, Sangakkara drives it to long off for a single
outside the off stump, Kapugedera pushes it on the leg side for a single
on the leg stump, Sangakkara laps it round the corner for a couple
on the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
on the off stump, Sangakkara turns it to short fine leg for a single
short on the off stump, Sangakkara pulls it away to deep midwicket for a boundary
full toss on the off stump, Sangakkara lashes it to deep midwicket for a boundary
on the off stump, Sangakkar pushes it to long off for a single, that fetches him his eighth ODI hundred
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
fuller outside the off stump, Kapugedera pushes it past covers for a couple
half volley outside the off stump, Sangakkara drives it to long off for a single
outside the off stump, Kapugedera comes forward and defends
fuller on the leg stump, Kapugedera plays it away on the leg side for a single
outside the off stump, Sangakkara defends on the frontfoot
the lack of decisiveness did Sangakkara in as he shaped to play a pull but then settled to play a drive instead and gets a top edge that is gobbled up by the fielder at cover
outside the off stump, Silva gets on the backfoot and defends it back onto the pitch
outside the off stump, drives to cover
outside the off stump, Kapugedera defends on the frontfoot
on the leg stump, pushes it to long on
rapped on the pads outside the leg stump
fuller on the off stump, comes down the track and drives it to long off for a single
on the leg stump, Kapugedera pushes it to mid off for a single
outside th off stump, Silva defends on the frontfoot
on the leg stump, Silva drives it to long on for a single
on the leg stump, Kapugedera sweeps it to square leg for a single
outside the off stump, Silva cuts it fine to fine leg for a couple
short outside the off stump, Kapugedera looks to cut it but gets an outside edge to short third man
on the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
on a good length outside the off stump, Kapugedera goes inside out over covers for a boundary
short on the off stump, Kapugedera pulls it to midwicket
on the leg stump, Kapugedera plays the slog sweep to fetch himself a boundary
fuller on the off stump, Kapugedera pushes it to long off for three runs
wide down the leg side
short outside the off stump, Kapugedera pushes it to covers for a single
on the off stump, pushes it to covers again for a single
outside the off stump, left alone
on the leg stump, pushes it to square leg for a single
on the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
on the leg stump, pushes it to mid on for a single
on the leg stump, turns it to fine leg for a single
on the leg stump, pulls it to midwicket for a single
short on the middle stump, pulls it away to deep square leg
outside the off stump, rapped on the pads
outside the off stump, Silva defends on the frontfoot
comes forward and defends to the bowler.
on the middle and leg, worked through midwicket.
pushed back to the bowler.
nudges to short fine leg.
pushes down the ground to long on.
swept to fine leg for a single.
plays it late behind point to the fence.
hits it once again high in the air to deep-midwicket, Reza does an excellent job by pulling the ball back into play by while being in the air.
pushes to the onside.
swept behind square leg to the deep.
moves back and punches down the ground to long off.
swept down to fine leg for a single.
pushed down the ground to long on.
cuts it late to short thirdman, a misfield allows the second run.
pushes to the off side for a single.
short outside the off stump, Silva rocks back and cuts it to sweeper cover for a single
fuller on the off stump, Kapugedera plays it back to the bowler
on the leg stump, sweeps it to fine leg
on the off stump, Kapugedera pushes it to mid on for a single
short outside the off stump, Silva moves back a touch and looks to cut it away and Rahim moves across in anticipation and snaffles the catch up as the bowler, Kapali is jubilant
outside the leg stump, Dilshan looks to sweep it but gets rapped on the pads
short on the off stump, Kapugedera turns it to fine leg for a couple and gets to his fifty
short outside the offstump, Kapugedera cuts but gets a bottom edge for a single
outside the off stump, Dilshan looks to drive and gets an outside edge to third man to get off the mark
slower delivery outside the off stump, Kapugedera lofts it to long on for a couple
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
full delivery on the middle stump, Kapugedera pushes it to mid on but refuses a single
full outside the off stump, drives to cover
on the leg stump, sweeps it to short fine leg
short on the middle stump, pulls it to deep midwicket for a couple
full on the leg stump, Kapugedera gets under the delivery and lofts it to long on, where Nazimuddin not only floors the catch but carries it over the boundary for a six
outside the off stump, pushes it to cover and wants to take a single but is sent back by Dilshan
wide down the leg side
outside the off stump, pushes it back to the bowler
short on the middle stump, Kapugedera pulls it away to deep square leg for a single
short outside the off stump, Dilshan looks to cut it away but gets an under edge to third man for a couple. The shot looked quite odd
outside the off stump, pushes it to sweeper cover for a couple
short on the middle stump, Dilshan pulls it to square leg for a couple again
on the leg stump, Dilshan plays it to mid on with soft hands for a single
short and slower outside the off stump, Kapugedera pushes it to cover
short outside the off stump, cut to point for a single
short outside the off stump, Kapugedera cuts it past point for a boundary.
fuller outsdie the off stump, Kapugedera lofts it away to long off for a couple
on the leg stump, Kapugedera pushes it on the leg side for a couple
full in length outside the off stump, Kapugedera  pushes it back to the bowler
on the leg stump, Kapugedera pushes it to long on to retain the strike
short outside the off stump, Kapugedera pulls it away to deep midwicket for a couple

on the off stump, Kapugedera moves across and lofts the ball away to long on where Mashrafe takes the easiest of the catches. Kapugedera did not impart enough to the shot to send it soaring above long on
outside the off stump, Vaas pushes it on the off side for a single
short outside the off stump, Dilshan cuts it to sweeper cover for a single
outside the off stump, Vaas comes onto the frontfoot and defends it back onto the pitch
on the leg stump, Vaas turns it away but can't quite get it past the fielder at short fine leg
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
on the off stump, Dilshan drives it to mid off for a single
outside the off stump, Vaas cuts it to third man for a single
wide down the leg side
outside the off stump, Dilshan drives it to cover for a single
googly on the leg stump, Vaas sweeps it to short fine leg
on the middle stump, Vaas defends on the frontfoot
outside the off stump, Dilshan falls forward and drives it to extra cover
outside the off stump and short in length, Dilshan cuts it to deep point for a single
on the middle stump, Vaas defends stoically
outside the off stump, guides it to point for a single
on the off stump, Dilshan drives it to long off for a single
full toss outside the off stump, Vaas drives it to long off to retain the strike
outside the off stump, drives it to point
on the leg stump, sweeps it to fine leg for a single
on the leg stump, Vaas defends on the frontfoot
on the leg stump, pushes it to fine leg for a single
wide outside the off stump
on the leg stump, Vaas pushes it to square leg for a couple
on the leg stump, Vaas turns it to square leg for a single
on the middle stump, Dilshan drives it to long off for a single
on the leg stump, Vaas pushes it to midwicket
on the leg stump, Vaas sweeps it away to fine leg for a single
short on the leg stump, Dilshan slogs it to deep midwicket for a boundary
on the off stump, Vaas pushes it to the outfield on the off side for a single
slower delivery outside the off stump, Dilshan cuts it to deep point for a single
short outside the off stump, Vaas looks to play it away fine but is beaten by the lack of pace on the delivery
Vaas falls looking for quick runs as he charges down the track and lofts a good length delivery down the throat of Tamim Iqbal at long on
outside the off stump, cuts it to third man for a couple
on the off stump, drives it to long off for a single
on the off stump, Dilshan charges down the track and drives it to long on for a single
on a good length on the off stump, Kulasekhara drives it to cover
short outside the off stump, Kulasekhara gets an outside edge to third man for a single
short outside the off stump, Dilshan pulls it to deep midwicket for a single
on the middle stump and short in length, Kulasekhara pulls it and can't clear Ashraful at midwicket and has to go back
outside the off stump, Dilshan looks to cut it away but misses it
outside the off stump, MEndis defends on the backfoot
on the leg stump, off the edge to point for a single
on the off stump and fuller in length, Dilshan comes down the track and lofts it high in the air for Tamim to come in and take the catch at mid off
short outside the off stump, cut to third man for a single
outside the off stump, pushes it to point for a single
on the leg stump, paddles it round the corner for a boundary, beating the fielder at short fine leg
on a good length, Muralitharan moves back and smashes it past extra cover for a boundary
on the leg stump,Muralitharan looks to pull it away but gets a top edge, taken by Ashraful at midwicket
short outside the off stump, comes down the track and cuts it away to third man for a boundary
on the leg stump, Mendis moves across and chips it to fine leg, Dolar manning there drops the catch
outside the off stump, drives it to long off
on the leg stump, Mendis chips it to fine leg to fetch himself a couple

inn2.comm: on the money with the first ball as he pitches it on the middle stump. Iqbal does well to defend it
now swinging it away, Tamim chases it and misses
outside the off stump, Tamim comes forward and defends it to point
on the off stump again and Tamim prods at it as the ball goes to point
outside the off stump and swinging away a touch, left all alone by Tamim
swinging away, Tamim comes forward and defends it to cover. Good start by Vaas as he begins with a maiden
swinging in from the middle stump, rapped high on the pads, thus negating the appeal
short outside the off stump, Nazimuddin cuts it to deep point for a single
slower ball on the middle stump, taking Tamim by surprise. In the end, Tamim does well to bring the bat down in time to defend it
short outside the off stump, and swinging away. Tamim chases it and misses it. A Sound as it passed Tamim created interest in the fielders but it was nowhere near the bat
on the off stump, Tamim defends it on the frontfoot
Tamim does make a fine understudy to Sangakkara as he pulls out a Sangakkara style flick through square leg for a boundary and does make a fine copy
fuller outside the off stump, Nazimuddin drives it to cover
cuts it into the right hander, who defends it on the frontfoot to cover

first blood! Vaas set the batsman up by bowling a couple of incoming deliveries and then swirls it away from him. Nazimuddin falls for the trap and chases it and gets an outside edge back to Sangakkara. Good display of swing bowling by Vaas
straight away he gets an outside edge to third man for a single. Not a convincing way to get off the mark but Ashraful will take it
outside the off stump, Tamim looks to drive it on the off side but gets a leading edge to mid on
drifts onto the leg stump as Tamim comfortably flicks it away to fine leg to keep the strike for himself
full on the off stump, drives it back to the bowler
outside the off stump, Tamim plays it with soft hands to mid off for a single
on the leg stump, defends on the frontfoot
fuller on the off and middle, Ashraful gets right behind the delivery and defends it
outside the off stump, Ashraful comes forward and defends it to point
on the leg stump, Ashraful stands tall and pushes it square leg
outside the off stump and fuller in length, Tamim drives it to mid off
slower delivery on the middle stump, Tamim picks it and flicks it away to deep midwicket for a couple
on a good length on the off stump, Tamim defends but with his bat behind the pad and is lucky again that it did hit the pad or......
on the leg stump, Tamim turns it to square leg for a single
outside the off stump and swinging it away a touch. Ashraful has a tentative prod at it and is beaten
now thats a mark of a man in form as Ashraful goes after a wide delivery and drives it to cover fence. It goes to the fence in a flash
fuller on the off stump, Tamim defends it to mid off
fuller in length again as Tamim drives it to mid off. He needs to split the gaps if Bangladesh are to chase this target down
short on the rib cage. Tamim just pushes it down and wants a single. Ashraful refuses the call for single
fuller outside the off stump, Tamim drives it to mid off
now this shot evokes memories of Tamim at his best as he comes down the track and punishes it past extra cover for a boundary
outside the off stump, Tamim comes forward and guides it to point
Ashraful is getting into the groove as he square drives a ball past point for a single
outside the off stump, Tamim is still playing with the bat behind his pad. He defends it to point
now offering pads as a first line of defence would do him no good as he looks to drive it but is rapped on the pads first as the ball is swinging away from outside the off stump
Tamim gets off the strike by turning away the delivery to fine leg for a single
beast! Vaas swings it away from the right hander and Ashraful chases it and is beaten
outside the off stump, Ashraful watchfully defends it on the frontfoot
short outside the off stump, Tamim cuts it to point, where a rare misfield by Dilshan allows them to take a couple
now you can't call it a drop as Tamim moves back and has a full blow at it and gets an outside edge in between keeper and first slip for a boundary. Lucky break this for Tamim
bounces him, and promptly called a wide
on the off stump, defends to mid off
on the leg stump, turns it away to fine leg for a single
full outside the off stump, Ashraful cautiously defends it on the frontfoot
fuller outside the off stump, drives it to long off
outside the off stump, Ashraful makes room and looks to play it away on the off side but is beaten
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
fuller outside the off stump, Ashraful defends on the frontfoot
fuller on the off stump, Ashraful drives but straight to the fielder at mid off
outside the off stump, drives it to cover
on the middle stump, and swinging away. Ashraful looks to play it away on the leg side and gets a top edge which is floored by Jayasuriya
outside the off stump and rushing into Ashraful, who defends it on the backfoot
on the leg stump,Ashraful looks to play it away on the leg side but gets rapped on the pads and the ball runs away for four leg byes

on the leg stump, Ashraful looks to pull it away and gets a glove to it on the way to the keeper and has to trudge his way back to the pavilion. Ashraful is clearly unhappy, but is it with his shot selection or the umpire's decision? Only he can answer
outside the off stump, left all alone by Raqibul
short on the middle stump, Raqibul ducks under it
Fernando oversteps and Raqibul defends it back to the bowler
Free Hit Raqibul makes room and lofts it over long off for a couple
on the leg stump, Tamim turns it away to fine leg for a single
outside the off stump, Raqibul pushes it to deep point for a single
on the leg stump, Tamim pushes it to leg side and takes a single
outside the off stump, defends on the frontfoot to point
outside the off stump and fuller in length, drives to long off for a single
on the leg stump, Tamim pushes it back to the bowler
on the leg stump, pushes it to square leg for a single
short outside the off stump, left all alone by Raqibul
short on the middle stump, defended back onto the pitch by Raqibul
on the leg stump, Raqibul pushes it to midwicket for a single
on the leg stump, struck on the helmet by a bouncer
on the leg stump, Tamim stands tall and pushes it to fine leg for a single
fuller on the off stump, Tamim drives it to mid on but Raqibul backs up too far and  has to turn back. A slip by Vaas allows him to get back to the crease safely
on the leg stump, Tamim defends it on the leg stump
murder on the mind now! Tamim comes down the track and lofts it away to long on boundary

how does a bowler exact revenge for being treated rudely by the batsman? Simple, take his wicket. Tamim comes down the track again and looks to loft it away. Kulasekara notices this and slips a faster one in. Tamim yorks himself and is bowled
outside the off stump, left well alone by Rahim
short outside the off stump, Rahim ducks under it safely
on the leg stump, Raqibul turns it to fine leg for three runs
on the off stump, defends on the frontfoot
